QuestData.Title: To Mechagon!
QuestData.Description:
Whatever's waiting for us on the shores of Mechagon, we're going to be ready for it with this crew.
I don't hold any misconceptions about how that crazy king is going to welcome us. Guns blazin', I'm sure.
So we're going in quietly on this submarine. Low profile'll keep us all safe.
When you're ready to go, talk to Captain Krooz.
QuestData.LogDescription: Talk with Captain Krooz to travel to Mechagon.
